statements: SELECT * FROM user_login;
SELECT id, username FROM user_login;
SELECT username, password FROM user_login WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM user_login WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT id, password FROM user_login WHERE username = 'jane_smith';
SELECT id, username, password FROM user_login WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM user_login WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT id, username FROM user_login WHERE password = 'password123' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_login;
SELECT id, username FROM user_login WHERE username LIKE '%doe%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, role_name FROM user_roles ORDER BY role_id DESC;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username FROM users WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' AND password = 'p@ssw0rd';
SELECT user_id, role_name FROM users INNER JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id WHERE role_name = 'Admin';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%smith%' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT role_name FROM user_roles ORDER BY role_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, role_name FROM user_roles JOIN user_access ON user_roles.role_id = user_access.role_id;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_access ua ON u.user_id = ua.user_id JOIN user_roles r ON ua.role_id = r.role_id ORDER BY u.username DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id > 5 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles r ON u.user_id = 2 AND r.role_id = 1;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles r ON u.user_id = r.role_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, password FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT role_id, role_name FROM roles ORDER BY role_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY role_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id WHERE role_id = 1;
SELECT users.username, roles.role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON roles.role_id = user_roles.role_id WHERE users.username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT user_id, MAX(login_time) AS last_login FROM login_attempts GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY last_login DESC;
SELECT username, role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON roles.role_id = user_roles.role_id WHERE role_name IN ('Admin', 'Editor');
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) AS unique_users, COUNT(*) AS total_attempts FROM login_attempts WHERE login_success = true;
SELECT * FROM user_credentials;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_credentials;
SELECT security_question, security_answer FROM user_credentials WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_sessions ORDER BY login_time DESC;
SELECT role_name, description FROM user_roles WHERE role_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM user_credentials;
SELECT username, security_question FROM user_credentials WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, password FROM user_credentials WHERE username = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM user_sessions ORDER BY login_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, login_time, logout_time FROM user_sessions WHERE logout_time IS NULL;
